subject: Soccer
Copa America (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: The Copa América, the world’s first continental soccer tournament, has had a long and uneven 99-year history that has at times captivated South America, if not the rest of the world.
snippet: The Copa América, the world’s first continental soccer tournament, has had a long and uneven 99-year history that has at times captivated South America, if not the rest of the world.
